availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Woodford County Sct January Court 1863
Jany 5th 1863

The term of John W Combs Sheriff of this County who was appointed to fill the unexpired Term of Richard B George late Sheriff of this County having expired on this day, on the application of said John W Combs It is ordered that he be appointed Sheriff of Woodford County to fill the Vacancy of in said office until the next August Election & until his successor shall be chosen and qualified

A Copy test
David P Robb Clerk
Woodford Co Court

Woodford
Sheriff
J W Combs
com Issd Jany 6 1863
